task.title: Copying Additional Resources to WebHelp Output Directory

context.p: To copy additional resources (such as JavaScript, CSS or other resources) to the output directory of a WebHelp system, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Place all your resources in the same directory.
Edit the value for the webhelp.custom.resources parameter and set it to the absolute path of the directory in step 1.
Click OK to save the changes to the transformation scenario.
step.stepresult: All files from the new directory will be copied to the root of the WebHelp output directory.
